info.title: Storefront Checkout API
info.description:
### Checkout
The Storefront Checkout does not use API Tokens and allows for Checkout data to be scraped directly from the front end or used in a Stencil Theme.

Note:
* The Try It Now at each endpoint will not work. Please see [Cart and Checkout](/api-docs/cart-and-checkout/cart-and-checkout-overview) for a script that can be used to get Cart details.
* checkoutId is the same as the cartId.
* The redirect url endpoint does not work using the Storefront Cart. At this time shoppers can not be directed to any carts or checkouts created using the Storefront APIS.

get.description:
Returns a *Checkout*.

**Notes**

The cart ID and checkout ID are the same.

cart.title: Cart
cart.description: A cart contains a collection of items, prices, discounts, etc. It does not contain customer-related data.

id.description: Cart ID, provided after creating a cart with a POST.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer to which the cart belongs.

email.description: The cart's email. This is the same email that is used in the billing address

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency which prices are displayed (the store default currency).

name.description: The currency name.

decimalPlaces.description: Number of decimal places for the currency. For example, USD currency has two decimal places.

taxIncluded.description: Boolean representing whether tax information is included.

baseAmount.description: Cost of cart's contents, before applying discounts.

discountAmount.description: Discounted amount.

cartAmount.description: Sum of line-items amounts, minus cart-level discounts and coupons. This amount includes taxes (where applicable).

couponType.description: Key name to identify the type of coupon.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

items.title: Item Custom
items.description:
Add a custom item to the shoppers cart. 
* Custom items are not added to the catalog.
* The price should be set to match the store settings for taxes.

name.description: Item name

listPrice.description: Price of the item. With or without tax depending on your stores set up.

createdTime.description: Time when the cart was created.

updatedTime.description: Time when the cart was last updated.

fieldValue.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

items.title: Consignment
items.description: This allows us to have multiple shipping addresses. Where there is only one shipping address, this array will contain only one value, with all the items.

fieldValue.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

availableShippingOptions.description: This is available only when "include=consignments.availableShippingOptions" is presented in the URL.

type.description: Specified the type of shipping option. Flat rate, UPS, etc.,

transitTime.description: An estimate of the arrival time.

isRecommended.description: Is this shipping method the recommended shipping option or not.

type.description: Specified the type of shipping option. Flat rate, UPS, etc.,

transitTime.description: An estimate of the arrival time.

couponDiscounts.description: List of consignment discounts applied through coupons

code.description: Coupon code that applied this discount

discounts.description: List of consignment discounts applied through cart level discounts

id.description: Discount rule ID that applied this discount

shippingCost.description: The shipping cost for this consignment.

handlingCost.description: The handling cost of shipping for this consignment.

displayName.description: The coupon title based on different types provided in control panel section

couponType.description: Key name to identify the type of coupon.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

shippingCostTotal.description: Shipping cost before any discounts are applied.

handlingCostTotal.description: Handling cost for all consignments including or excluding tax.

name.description: Name of the tax charged. This is either the system default or the custom name created for the tax.

subtotal.description: Subtotal of the checkout before applying item level discounts. Tax inclusive based on the store settings.

grandTotal.description: The total payable amount, before applying any store credit or gift certificate.

giftCertificates.description: Applied gift certificate (as a payment method).

items.description: The values presented here are projections of how much we would be using out of an existent gift certificate

put.description:
Updates a *Checkout Line Item*. Updates an existing, single line item in the cart.

**Notes** 

If a variant needs to be changed or updated, the product will need to be removed and re-added to the cart with the correct variants using the [Add Cart Line Items](SF Cart Line Items) endpoint.

post.description:
Adds a new *Consignment* to *Checkout*.


There are two steps to add a new shipping address and shipping options with line items. 
1. Add a [new Consignment](/api-reference/cart-checkout/storefront-checkout-api/checkout/checkoutsconsignmentsbycheckoutidpost) to Checkout.
	2. Send a POST to Consignments with each shipping address and line items IDs. Each address can have its own line item IDs.
	3. As part of the request URL make sure to add `include=consignments.availableShippingOptions` to return the available shipping options based on line items and shipping locations. This will return `availableShippingOptions` in the response.
3. [Update the Consignment](/api-reference/cart-checkout/storefront-checkout-api/checkout/checkoutsconsignmentsbycheckoutidandconsignmentidput) with Shipping Options.

**Required Query**
* consignments.availableShippingOptions

**Required Fields**
* shipping_address
* line_items

To learn more about creating a Checkout Consignment see [Working with the Fetch API](/api-docs/cart-and-checkout/working-sf-apis).

put.description:
Updates an existing consignment. Shipping address, line item IDs or the shipping option ID can be updated using this endpoint.

There are two steps to add a new shipping address and shipping options with line items. 
1. Add a [new Consignment](/api-reference/cart-checkout/storefront-checkout-api/checkout/checkoutsconsignmentsbycheckoutidpost) to Checkout.
3. [Update the Consignment](/api-reference/cart-checkout/storefront-checkout-api/checkout/checkoutsconsignmentsbycheckoutidandconsignmentidput) with Shipping Options.
	4. Update each *Consignment* `shippingOptionId` (shipping address and line items) with the `availableShippingOption > id` from Step One. 


**Required Fields**
* shippingOptionId

To learn more about creating a Checkout Consignment see [Working with the Fetch API](/api-docs/cart-and-checkout/working-sf-apis).

customer_id.description: ID of the customer to which the cart belongs.

email.description: The cart's email. This is the same email that is used in the billing address

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency which prices are displayed (the store default currency).

name.description: The currency name.

decimalPlaces.description: Number of decimal places for the currency. For example, USD currency has two decimal places.

taxIncluded.description: Boolean representing whether tax information is included.

baseAmount.description: Cost of cart's contents, before applying discounts.

discountAmount.description: Discounted amount.

cartAmount.description: Sum of line-items amounts, minus cart-level discounts and coupons. This amount includes taxes (where applicable).

displayName.description: The coupon title based on different types provided in control panel section

couponType.description: Key name to identify the type of coupon.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

name.description: The name provided by the merchant.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

parentId.description: The product is part of a bundle such as a product pick list, then the parentId or the main product id will populate.

name.description: The item's product name.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image of this item, accessible on the internet.

discounts.description: List of discounts applied to this item, as an array of AppliedDiscount objects.

name.description: The name provided by the merchant.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

discountAmount.description: The total value of all discounts applied to this item (excluding coupon).

couponAmount.description: The total value of all coupons applied to this item.

listPrice.description: Item's list price, as quoted by the manufacturer/distributor.

salePrice.description: Item's price after all discounts are applied. (The final price before tax calculation.)

extendedListPrice.description: Item's list price multiplied by the quantity.

extendedSalePrice.description: Item's sale price multiplied by the quantity.

type.description: the product type - physical or digital

addedByPromotion.description: If the item was added automatically by a promotion such as a coupon or buy one, get one.

isShippingRequired.description: Whether this item requires shipping to a physical address.

name.description: The name provided by the merchant.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

discountAmount.description: The total value of all discounts applied to this item (excluding coupon).

salePrice.description: Item's price after all discounts are applied. (The final price before tax calculation.)

items.title: Item Custom
items.description:
Add a custom item to the shoppers cart. 
* Custom items are not added to the catalog.
* The price should be set to match the store settings for taxes.

name.description: Item name

listPrice.description: Price of the item. With or without tax depending on your stores set up.

createdTime.description: Time when the cart was created.

updatedTime.description: Time when the cart was last updated.

fieldValue.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

items.title: Consignment
items.description: This allows us to have multiple shipping addresses. Where there is only one shipping address, this array will contain only one value, with all the items.

fieldValue.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

availableShippingOptions.description: This is available only when "include=consignments.availableShippingOptions" is presented in the URL.

type.description: Specified the type of shipping option. Flat rate, UPS, etc.,

transitTime.description: An estimate of the arrival time.

isRecommended.description: Is this shipping method the recommended shipping option or not.

type.description: Specified the type of shipping option. Flat rate, UPS, etc.,

transitTime.description: An estimate of the arrival time.

couponDiscounts.description: List of consignment discounts applied through coupons

code.description: Coupon code that applied this discount

discounts.description: List of consignment discounts applied through cart level discounts

id.description: Discount rule ID that applied this discount

shippingCost.description: The shipping cost for this consignment.

handlingCost.description: The handling cost of shipping for this consignment.

displayName.description: The coupon title based on different types provided in control panel section

couponType.description: Key name to identify the type of coupon.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

shippingCostTotal.description: Shipping cost before any discounts are applied.

handlingCostTotal.description: Handling cost for all consignments including or excluding tax.

name.description: Name of the tax charged. This is either the system default or the custom name created for the tax.

subtotal.description: Subtotal of the checkout before applying item level discounts. Tax inclusive based on the store settings.

grandTotal.description: The total payable amount, before applying any store credit or gift certificate.

giftCertificates.description: Applied gift certificate (as a payment method).

items.title: Gift Certificate
items.description: The values presented here are projections of how much we would be using out of an existent gift certificate

createdTime.description: Time when the cart was created.

updatedTime.description: Time when the cart was last updated.

customerMessage.description: Shopper's message provided as details for the order to be created from this cart

delete.description:
Deletes an existing *Gift Certificate*. 

**Notes**

This removes the *Gift Certificate* payment method.

cart.title: Cart
cart.description: A cart contains a collection of items, prices, discounts, etc. It does not contain customer-related data.

id.description: Cart ID, provided after creating a cart with a POST.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer to which the cart belongs.

email.description: The cart's email. This is the same email that is used in the billing address

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency which prices are displayed (the store default currency).

name.description: The currency name.

decimalPlaces.description: Number of decimal places for the currency. For example, USD currency has two decimal places.

taxIncluded.description: Boolean representing whether tax information is included.

baseAmount.description: Cost of cart's contents, before applying discounts.

discountAmount.description: Discounted amount.

cartAmount.description: Sum of line-items amounts, minus cart-level discounts and coupons. This amount includes taxes (where applicable).

displayName.description: The coupon title based on different types provided in control panel section

couponType.description: Key name to identify the type of coupon.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

name.description: The name provided by the merchant.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

parentId.description: The product is part of a bundle such as a product pick list, then the parentId or the main product id will populate.

name.description: The item's product name.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image of this item, accessible on the internet.

discounts.description: List of discounts applied to this item, as an array of AppliedDiscount objects.

name.description: The name provided by the merchant.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

discountAmount.description: The total value of all discounts applied to this item (excluding coupon).

couponAmount.description: The total value of all coupons applied to this item.

listPrice.description: Item's list price, as quoted by the manufacturer/distributor.

salePrice.description: Item's price after all discounts are applied. (The final price before tax calculation.)

extendedListPrice.description: Item's list price multiplied by the quantity.

extendedSalePrice.description: Item's sale price multiplied by the quantity.

type.description: the product type - physical or digital

addedByPromotion.description: If the item was added automatically by a promotion such as a coupon or buy one, get one.

isShippingRequired.description: Whether this item requires shipping to a physical address.

items.title: Item Custom
items.description:
Add a custom item to the shoppers cart. 
* Custom items are not added to the catalog.
* The price should be set to match the store settings for taxes.

name.description: Item name

listPrice.description: Price of the item. With or without tax depending on your stores set up.

createdTime.description: Time when the cart was created.

updatedTime.description: Time when the cart was last updated.

fieldValue.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

items.description: This allows us to have multiple shipping addresses. Where there is only one shipping address, this array will contain only one value, with all the items.

fieldValue.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

availableShippingOptions.description: This is available only when "include=consignments.availableShippingOptions" is presented in the URL.

type.description: Specified the type of shipping option. Flat rate, UPS, etc.,

transitTime.description: An estimate of the arrival time.

isRecommended.description: Is this shipping method the recommended shipping option or not.

type.description: Specified the type of shipping option. Flat rate, UPS, etc.,

transitTime.description: An estimate of the arrival time.

couponDiscounts.description: List of consignment discounts applied through coupons

code.description: Coupon code that applied this discount

discounts.description: List of consignment discounts applied through cart level discounts

id.description: Discount rule ID that applied this discount

shippingCost.description: The shipping cost for this consignment.

handlingCost.description: The handling cost of shipping for this consignment.

displayName.description: The coupon title based on different types provided in control panel section

couponType.description: Key name to identify the type of coupon.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

shippingCostTotal.description: Shipping cost before any discounts are applied.

handlingCostTotal.description: Handling cost for all consignments including or excluding tax.

name.description: Name of the tax charged. This is either the system default or the custom name created for the tax.

subtotal.description: Subtotal of the checkout before applying item level discounts. Tax inclusive based on the store settings.

grandTotal.description: The total payable amount, before applying any store credit or gift certificate.

giftCertificates.description: Applied gift certificate (as a payment method).

items.title: Gift Certificate
items.description: The values presented here are projections of how much we would be using out of an existent gift certificate

createdTime.description: Time when the cart was created.

updatedTime.description: Time when the cart was last updated.

customerMessage.description: Shopper's message provided as details for the order to be created from this cart

giftCertificate.title: Line Item Gift Certificate Request Data

message.description: Message shown to recipient, as provided by sender.

LineItemGiftCertificateRequestData.title: Line Item Gift Certificate Request Data

message.description: Message shown to recipient, as provided by sender.

fieldValue.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

UpdateConsignmentRequest.title: Update Consignment Request
UpdateConsignmentRequest.description: One or more of these three fields are mandatory. Shipping address and line items can be updated in one request. Shipping option ID has to be updated in a separate request, since changing the address or line items can invalidate the previously available shipping options.

fieldValue.description: This can also be an array for fields that need to support list of values (e.g., a set of check boxes.)

parentId.description: Bundled items will have their parent's item Id.

name.description: The item's product name.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image of this item, accessible on the internet.

discounts.description: List of discounts applied to this item, as an array of AppliedDiscount objects.

name.description: The name provided by the merchant.

discountedAmount.description: The discounted amount applied within a given context.

discountAmount.description: The total value of all discounts applied to this item (excluding coupon).

couponAmount.description: The total value of all coupons applied to this item.

listPrice.description: Item's list price, as quoted by the manufacturer/distributor.

salePrice.description: Item's price after all discounts are applied. (The final price before tax calculation.)

extendedListPrice.description: Item's list price multiplied by the quantity.

extendedSalePrice.description: Item's sale price multiplied by the quantity.

type.description: the product type - physical or digital

ItemCustom.title: Item Custom
ItemCustom.description:
Add a custom item to the shoppers cart. 
* Custom items are not added to the catalog.
* The price should be set to match the store settings for taxes.

name.description: Item name

listPrice.description: Price of the item. With or without tax depending on your stores set up.
